actions.description: Publish data to the Kafka topic that you select.

topic.labelHint: Select the Kafka topic to send data to.

actions.name: Publish

actions.description: Receive data from the Kafka topic that you select.

topic.labelHint: Select the Kafka topic to receive data from.

actions.name: Subscribe

brokers.label: common
brokers.labelHint: Comma separated list of Kafka broker URIs in the form host:port.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the API
authenticationType.label: producer

basePath.description: API basePath for example /v2. Default is unset if set overrides the value present in OpenAPI specification.
basePath.label: producer

host.description: Scheme hostname and port to direct the HTTP requests to in the form of https://hostname:port.
host.label: producer

actions.description: Receive all messages sent to the chat bot.
actions.name: Receive Messages

actions.description: Send a message to the chat (through the bot).

chatId.description: Telegram's Id for the chat. If not set then the CamelTelegramChatId from the incoming message is used.

actions.name: Send a Text Message

authorizationToken.description: Telegram bot authorization token that can be obtained from the Telegram BotFather.
authorizationToken.label: security
